Text: Please seed. I'm at 87% and I will seed when I've finished downloading this superb package.
I must say I am a little confused.  How does the term "warez" get associated with Linux?????

Warez has nothing to do with the operating system but has to do with the "legality" of the distribution of the software. If you do not have a license to distribute software, doing so, makes the distributed copies warez. Or something to that effect at least.

Software for Linux can be free/opensource and it can be proprietary and commercial, just like software for lesser operating systems.

Pirates deal with illegal copies of proprietary and commercial software, commonly referred to as warez.
